name: Google Apps Script IntelliJ Plugin
tagline: Synchronization for Google Apps Script inside IntelliJ-IDEA
body:
### Upload and download Google Apps Script project files to and from your Google Drive

![Showcase](http://zippy.gfycat.com/ClutteredTimelyIrishredandwhitesetter.gif)

### Installation
Download it inside IntelliJ
[IntelliJ Browse Repositories](https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/7977?pr=idea)

### Usage
`CTRL-SHIFT-O` (download) and `CTRL-SHIFT-P` (upload)


### Authors and Contributors
Michael Snowden (@MichaelSnowden)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
